text: Hianagi Ra Anumzamo'a amanage huno nehie. Tamagrama havi avu'ava zama nehaza zante'ma nonama huramante'nua zana retro nehuankina, havi avu'ava zanteti nona huramante'na tamazeri haviza hanugeta tamagra'a tamagura ovazigahaze. Ana hanugeta ko'ma tamavufga rama nehuta vanoma nehaza zana huta vanoa osugahaze. Na'ankure kefo knamo tamagritera egahie.
